bug.question: I have six legs and like to march. I often carry crumbs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am very small.
💪 I can lift many times my own weight.
🍕 I love picnics.

bug.question: I have colorful wings and fly from flower to flower, sipping nectar. What am I?

hints.text: 🌸 I love sweet things.
🎨 My wings have pretty patterns.
🦋 I start as a caterpillar.

bug.question: I make honey and live in a hive. I can also sting! What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am yellow and black.
🍯 I am known for a sweet treat.
🌼 I visit flowers all day long.

bug.question: I hop around in the grass and make a chirping sound. What am I?

hints.text: 🦵 I have strong legs for jumping.
🟢 I am usually green.
🎶 I make music in the summer.

bug.question: I light up at night with a glowing light. What am I?

hints.text: 🔦 My light helps me find a friend.
✨ I twinkle in the dark.
🌃 You can often see me during the summer.

bug.question: I am small and red with black spots. I am considered lucky! What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 My spots help me hide.
🍀 Some say I bring good fortune.
🪴 I eat aphids that harm plants.

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch my dinner. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ My home is often in a corner.
🕷️ I have eight legs but am not an insect.
🦗 Flies and other bugs get stuck in my trap.

bug.question: I am a bug that makes a loud noise by rubbing my wings together. What am I?

hints.text: 🔊 My sound is often heard in late summer.
🌳 I live in trees.
🎶 I make a chirping sound.

bug.question: I am a beetle that can roll dung into a ball. What am I?

hints.text: 💩 I like to roll a special ball.
🌍 I live in many parts of the world
🪲 My name describes my job.

bug.question: I live in a colony and build amazing structures with mud. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I build my house from the earth.
👑 I have a queen.
🐜 My relatives are small but mighty.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears, and I love to eat peanuts. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐘 I am a very large animal.
🥜 I am known for eating lots of peanuts.
💧 I use my nose to spray water.

animal.question: I say 'meow' and love to chase mice. What am I?

hints.text: 🐈‍⬛ I am often a house pet.
🧶 I like to play with yarn.
🥛 I drink milk.

animal.question: I wag my tail and bark, and I love to play fetch. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I like to chew on bones.
🗣️ I am known as man's best friend.
🐾 I have four legs and fur.

animal.question: I hop around and have a fluffy tail. I love to eat carrots. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 Carrots are a favorite food of mine.
🐰 I am often found in gardens.
🌱 I am an herbivore.

animal.question: I roar loudly and am known as the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 I have a mane.
🥩 I am a carnivore.
🦁 I am a big cat.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and live in Africa. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦓 Each one of us has unique stripes.
🌾 I eat mostly grass.
🌍 I am often found in herds.

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I can reach the highest leaves.
🦒 My spots help me blend in.
🌍 I live in Africa.

animal.question: I swim in the ocean and have a big tail. I am known for being very intelligent. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I live in the water.
🐬 I am a mammal, not a fish.
🗣️ I communicate with clicks and whistles.

animal.question: I slither on the ground and sometimes hiss. Some of us are poisonous. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I have no legs.
👅 I flick my tongue to smell.
🥚 I lay eggs.

animal.question: I can fly high in the sky and have sharp talons. I am known for my excellent eyesight. What am I?

hints.text: 🦅 I am a bird of prey.
🪶 I have strong wings.
⛰️ I often nest on cliffs.
